1:
À Dagwi, hwo man nu, hwo wey ɛ yuu wɛt!
Hwo ye jaram wɛt!
2:
Di, bemât repugu mō ba ga doyo e ra hwo,
vemo de be kyɛ́ ɛn hwo ba ga sogo a hwo nehywɛ.
3:
Bé yong begwông repugu wɔ̀ sɛ̀ mɛ bemat mō,
be wuna nu mɛn, na be yong begwong beves
e ra vemo de ba sé pyɛ̂ yey mō.
4:
Yɛn e tē, “Tik wot a wey na BeIsrayɛl hywiri,
ko bê to wok reza mɛn wɛt!”
5:
Yɛn e ra badu, ko myak a hɛn
ba simo be wuna to e ra hwo.
6:
Yɛn vɛ a BeƐdɔm na BeIshmayɛl,
BeMowap na BeHagar,
7:
BeGebal, BeAmɔn, BeAmalɛk, BeFilisti,
tanga bemât repomô Tur.
8:
BeSirya ba wuna hɛn tanga yɛn,
na be gwɛ̌ a BeAmɔn na BeMowap, vɛ a yerê Lɔt, gap.
9:
À Dagwi, rá a yɛn sede hwà ra na BeMidyan,
sede hwà ra na Sisera tanga Yabin e Rɔt Kishɔn.
10:
Ba wey na yɛn e Ɛn-Dɔr,
ba tik bavin mɛn be bɔsɔ e hey.
11:
Rá a begbɔng bemat mɛn sede bá ra a Ɔrɛp tanga Zeep,
sede bá ra a Zeba na Zalmuna.
12:
Yɛn mwa ba ye, “Tik na wot a sey ɛ vwel
de ha sé hê Dagwi, na he tɛ́ ɛ mot.”
13:
À Dagwi hom, tɛ̀ ɛn be tɛ́ ɛn sede berang de wula wa rung,
sede byɛmɛ de ye raa gul.
14:
Sè a yɛn sede kya de he re rehwot,
sede nebelem kya de ne lolo e beraku.
15:
Ró ɛn na gwogul rwak mō,
tɛ̀ ɛn, be ye lot na sombabos mō!
16:
À Dagwi Darwey, tik be tē det na rekyen,
na be hwo jāma hwo.
17:
Tik ɛn be sɔ rekyen,
be sangal e de tē lot neshey gbak-gbak,
tik be wey e ji rekyen.
18:
Tik yɛn a tɔk, hwo nju mo zɔng de reza mō à Dagwi Darwey,
hwo nju mo à Dagwi De A Dal Na Reto Mwa e jey.
